room_title: Escape room "Tarot Card Mystery" by MindGames of Mebane in Mebane
room_description:
Poor Melinda Lee, her death at the hands of Roger T. Morgan left the local fortune-telling community in shock and sorrow…
Ms. Lee owned two ruby necklaces called Tarot’s Queen and Death’s Heart. The enormous rubies gave Ms. Lee’s predictions their amazing accuracy and are worth millions. She left everything, including the rubies, to her niece, Amber, and nephew, Victor.
Whoever found the rubies, got Ms. Lee’s entire fortune. Each was given just one hour to find it. Both failed. The Will directs that you now be given a chance. Can you find the rubies?
